junctionrelay.description: Directional fur strand overlay with physically-based shading. FBM flow field drives local strand direction for natural parting and clumping, three strand layers (fine underlayer, medium main coat, sparse guard hairs), root-to-tip colour gradient (dark root, light tip), Kajiya-Kay anisotropic specular model, inter-strand shadow depth, surface sheen shimmer. Fully self-contained.
